thread.section_title: AirportRentals.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AirportRentals.com | www.airportrentals.com
thread.title: Silvia

author: Silvia
title: Silvia
text:
Francesca and Angelo have been amazing!!! I called them before renting as I wanted to make sure that the vehicle I wanted to rent was going to meet my requirements. They provided me a lot of useful information and took a lot of time to explaim me the dimensions of the vehicle and to plan to me how to load the 10 pieces of luggage and 2 bikes. Extremely kind and professional!!!! Once in Rome, they helped me in getting my stuff properly organized :)
Very flexible and helpful. I could not hope in a better and more professional service!
You guys rock
Thank you :)
Silvia
